Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1983...
Injured on 4/30/1984 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1986, off Dave Rozema (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/1986, off Carlos A. Diaz (SF)...
Injured on 5/28/1986 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against St. Louis on 6/16/1987...
Injured on 6/26/1987 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1987, hitting .464 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1987, hitting .413 with 5 HR, 25 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1988, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1988, hitting .560 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 9/8/1990...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New York (N) on 9/25/1990...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1992, hitting .560 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Los Angeles on 7/27/1992...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Houston on 1/31/1993 (Going to HOU: 1B E. Martinez, P M. Perez, SS B. Larkin. Going to PIT: SS J. Valentin, 3B N. Nakamura, 1B A. Cabrera)...
Injured on 5/29/1993 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/23/1993 with a Broken Foot, out for full season...
Won World Series with Houston in 1994...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Los Angeles on 10/2/1995...
Won World Series with Houston in 1995...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 5/10/1996...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 9/15/1996...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1997, hitting .435 with 1 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1997 Allstar game...
Drove in 8 runs against Atlanta on 7/11/1997...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/1/1997, off James Baldwin (CHC)...
